summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the unpaid portion of certain assessments levied for the improvement of 22nd Avenue South, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, as provided for by Ordinance No. 15326 creating Local Improvement District No. 1413.
